title: 72/49. Convening of the fourth special session of the General Assembly devoted to disarmament

paragraphs.1: Welcomes the adoption by consensus of the recommendations on the objectives and agenda of the fourth special session of the General Assembly devoted to disarmament by the Open-ended Working Group on the fourth special session of the General Assembly devoted to disarmament, which was established by the Assembly by its resolution 65/66 and its decision 70/551 and which met in New York in 2016 and 2017;
paragraphs.2: Endorses the report of the Open-ended Working Group and the substantive recommendations contained therein;2
paragraphs.3: Expresses its appreciation to the participants of the Open-ended Working Group for their constructive contribution to its work;
paragraphs.4: Encourages Member States to continue consultations on the next steps for convening of the fourth special session of the General Assembly devoted to disarmament;
paragraphs.5: Decides to include in the provisional agenda of its seventy-third session, under the item entitled “General and complete disarmament”, the sub-item entitled “Convening of the fourth special session of the General Assembly devoted to disarmament”.
